name: Suicide Mission - Yet Another Space Shooter
name_original: Suicide Mission - Yet Another Space Shooter
description:
Controls: W-A-S-D for movement and left click (or spacebar) for shooting. If you are on a touchscreen you can move spaceship and shoot by simply moving your finger on the screen.

This is my first game that I started developing while I was following Unity course from Udemy by Ben Tristem and Rick Davidson. Since I'm a backend developer I knew a little C# and completely rewrote the project and added some new features to it. You can access source code from Github and plans from Trello. 

Game still not finished and I don't know if I'll ever finish because I got bored of it so quickly. UI needs a complete overhaul and level design is pain in the ass for me because I'm completely new to this. I managed to create 3 of them but these took me more than the time I rewrote the code and changed all assets. You can add more levels, change the game's name and publish it if you want as long as you credit me. Anyways have fun!

Github: https://github.com/UnioDex/SuicideMission
Trello: https://trello.com/b/KqICMpvA/suicide-mission-game-board
